item.title: Zeros Add Left
item.description:
Add zeros to the left of a string number

Example

Example (code </>)

html

<form class="form-inline" role="form" >
  <div class="form-group" >
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="txt-zeros" name="txt-zeros" placeholder="type a number" value="999" >
  </div>
  <button type="button" class="btn btn-default" onclick="javascript:addZeros()" >Click</button>
</form>

js

function addZeros() {
  $('#txt-zeros').val(
    Zeros.add_left( $('#txt-zeros').val(), '5' ) // old version of ejs-utils
  );

  $('#txt-zeros').val(
    Util.zeros.left( $('#txt-zeros').val(), '5' ); // new version ejs-utils.3.0.0
  );
}

item.title: Table
item.description:
Table

Example (code </>)

js

var Table = {
	calculateUs : function(idtable, posfield) {
		var vlr = 0;
		$("#" + idtable + " tbody tr > td:nth-child(" + posfield + ")").each(
		  function(i, el) {

		   var v = $(el).find('input').val();

		   if ( typeof v == 'undefined') {
		   vlr += Number(el.innerHTML.replace(".", "").replace(",", "."));

		   }else {
		   	 vlr += Number(v.replace(".", "").replace(",", "."));
	       }
	  });
	 return vlr;
	},
calculateBr : function(idtable, posfield) {
	return Money.formatBr(Table.calculateUs(idtable, posfield));
  }
};

item.title: Timeout
item.description:
Timeout

Example (code </>)

js

var Timeout = {
	set_html : function(href, time) {
		window.setTimeout(function() { window.location.href = href; }, time);
	}
};

item.title: Select
item.description:
Select

Example (code </>)

js

var Select = {
	option_select_attr : function(idselect, attr) {
		return $('option:selected', $('#'+idselect)).attr( attr );
	},
	remove_selected_option : function(idselect) {
		$('#' + idselect + ' option:selected').each(function() {
			$(this).remove();
		});
	},
	remove_all_option : function(idselect) {
		$('#' + idselect + ' option').each(function() {
			$(this).remove();
		});
	}
};

item.title: Radio
item.description:
Radio

Example (code </>)

js

var Radio = {
	checked : function(field, form) {
		return $('input[name='+field+']:checked', '#'+form).val();
	}
};

item.title: Money Format
item.description:
Money Format

Example (code </>)

js

var Money =
{
	formatBr: function(num) {
	    num = num.toString().replace(/\$|\,/g,'');

	    if(isNaN(num))
	        num = "0";

	    sign = (num == (num = Math.abs(num)));
	    num = Math.floor(num*100+0.50000000001);
	    cents = num%100;
	    num = Math.floor(num/100).toString();

	    if(cents<10)
	        cents = "0" + cents;

	    for (var i = 0; i < Math.floor((num.length-(1+i))/3); i++)
	        num = num.substring(0,num.length-(4*i+3))+'.'+ num.substring(num.length-(4*i+3));

	    return (((sign)?'':'-') + num + ',' + cents);
	},
	formatUs: function(num) {
		return num.replace(/\./g, "").replace(/,/, ".");
	}
}

item.title: Menu
item.description:
Menu

Example (code </>)

js

var Menu =
{
	hideAll: function() {
		$('div[id^="div-"]').hide();
	},
	show: function(id) {
		$('#div-'+id).show('slow');
	},
	init: function(id) {
		Menu.hideAll();
		Menu.show(id);
	},
	menuTitle: function(id, text) {
		$('#'+id).text(text);
	}
}

item.title: Mask
item.description:
Mask

Example (code </>)

js

var Mask =
{
	mascara : function(o,f) {
		v_obj = o
		v_fun = f
		setTimeout("Mask.execmascara()", 1)
	},
	execmascara : function() {
		v_obj.value=v_fun(v_obj.value)
	},
	mdata : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1/$2")
		return v
	},
	mhora : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1:$2")
		return v
	},
	mtelefone : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/^(\d\d)(\d)/g,"($1) $2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{4})(\d)/,"$1 - $2")
		return v
	},
	mcep : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1-$2")
		return v
	},
	mcpf : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{3})(\d{1,2})$/,"$1-$2")
		return v
	},
	mcnpj : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/^(\d{2})(\d)/,"$1.$2")
		v=v.replace(/^(\d{2})\.(\d{3})(\d)/,"$1.$2.$3")
		v=v.replace(/\.(\d{3})(\d)/,".$1/$2")
		v=v.replace(/(\d{4})(\d)/,"$1-$2")
		return v
	},
	mnumeros : function(v) {
		return v.replace(/\D/g,"")
	},
	mvalor : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d)(\d{2})$/,"$1.$2")
		return v
	},
	mvalorbr : function(v) {
		v=v.replace(/\D/g,"")
		v=v.replace(/(\d)(\d{2})$/,"$1,$2")
		return v
	}
};

item.title: Input
item.description:
Input

Example (code </>)

js

var Input = {
	readOnly : function(id) {
		document.getElementById( id ).readOnly = true;
		document.getElementById( id ).style.backgroundColor = "#CCC";
		document.getElementById( id ).value = '';
	},
	enabledField : function(id) {
		document.getElementById( id ).readOnly = false;
		document.getElementById( id ).style.backgroundColor = "#FFF";
		document.getElementById( id ).value = '';
	}
};

item.title: Form Clear
item.description:
Form Clear

Example (code </>)

js

var Form =
{
	clear : function(idform) {
		$('#'+idform).each(function() {
			this.reset();
		});
	}
};
